name: Chicken Attack (itch)
description:
Project for our GAMEDES class (December, 2015)

Controls: W/A/S/D – player movement

Space Bar – shoot

Mouse – aim

How to run:

  • Download Construct 2 in Steam
  • Open Construct 2
  • Open pewpewshooter.capx
  • Play

(Some of the art assets are not ours, this is only intended for our class project and not to be monetized)
